spinner.description: This will set the default CPU governor. Default CPU governor will only be set during early stages of booting (before init.d execution) and can be overriden by later scripts or apps.
spinner.name: Default CPU Governor

checkbox.description: Force Sync of Governors settings between cpu0 and cpu1 (default: enabled)
checkbox.name: Link CPU Governors
checkbox.label: Link CPU Governors

spinner.description: This will set the MIN CPU Freq (default: 384 Mhz, min: 192 Mhz)
spinner.name: Scaling Min CPUFreq

spinner.description: This will set the MAX CPU Freq (default: 1512 Mhz, max: 1836 Mhz)
spinner.name: Scaling Max CPUFreq

seekBar.description: Sets the sched_mc value which changes the cpu scheduler behaviour for multi-cpu systems. 0 is Samsung kernel's default value which turns sched_mc off. Setting it to 1 means that the first core will be tried to be loaded more and setting it to 2 will bias task wake-ups to semi-idle cpu package for power savings. (default: 0)
seekBar.name: sched_mc

checkbox.description: Enable Kernel based Multi-Core Hotplug decision. (default: enabled)
checkbox.name: Kernel Based MPDECISION
checkbox.label: enable in-kernel MPDECISION

checkbox.description: Enable unpluging of 2nd Core when Screen goes off. (default: enabled)
checkbox.name: 2nd Core HotPluging based on Screen state
checkbox.label: Turn 2nd Core off when screen goes off.

spinner.description: MPDECISION will not UnPlug Core1 if current FREQ is above this value. (default: 486MHz)
spinner.name: mpdec_idlefreq

seekBar.description: Minimum delay for MPDECISION to wait before a new Hotplug decision is made after a previous one (default: 500ms)
seekBar.name: mpdec_delay

seekBar.description: For some ROMs (e.g. Sense Ports) MPDECISION needs ahigher StartDelay. If u run into trouble with mpdec try to slightly increase this value otherwhise dont touch it! (default: 70000 ms)
seekBar.name: mpdec_startdelay

seekBar.description: This sets the minimum delay for MPDECISION to wait if hotpluging was controled outside of MPDEC. (default: 10000 ms)
seekBar.name: mpdec_pause

spinner.description: This sets the MIN Number of cpus used for MPDEC (default: 1 Core0 only, 2 is core0 and 1, core1 always on?!)
spinner.name: MPDEC MIN CPUS

spinner.description: This sets the MAX Number of cpus used for MPDEC (default: 2 Core0 and Core1, 1 is core 0 Only!
spinner.name: MPDEC MAX CPUS

seekBar.description: Screen Brightness (default:125 min:20 max:255). Sets the defult Screen Brightness
seekBar.name: TouchScreen Brightness

seekBar.description: Touchpad LED voltage level (default: 33mv min:25mv max: 33). You should not change this setting for now!
seekBar.name: Led Voltage Level

spinner.description: This will set the default I/O scheduler. Default I/O scheduler will only be set during early stages of booting (before init.d execution) and can be overriden by later scripts or apps.
spinner.name: Default I/O Scheduler

button.description: If the fuel gauge chip is behaving weird use this button to reset it. Give it a few hours after you reset it. It may still show you funny values for those period, then the battery percentage should be fine.
button.name: Reset Fuel-Gauge Chip
button.label: Reset Fuel-Gauge Chip

seekBar.description: CPU Undervolting in mV (default: 0mv, max: 100mV). Be carefull while using this Setting!!
seekBar.name: cpu_undervolting
